With Bradley Cooper delivering a strong performance, this film is sure to leave you on the edge of your seat.

I think I have just the movie for you! Considering your interest in Tron and its futuristic vibe, I'd recommend "Tora! Tora! Tora!" (1970). This war film is a classic, with impressive historical reenactments of the Pearl Harbor attack. The all-star cast, including James Whitmore and Martin Balsam, will keep you engaged throughout the movie.

If you're still unsure, I'd suggest "The Book Thief" (2013) as well. Set in World War II Germany, this film tells a powerful story of hope and resilience through the eyes of a young girl named Liesel. The stunning visuals and memorable performances make it a must-watch.
